data.title: Electronic Arts Named to Several ‘Best Places to Work’ Lists
data.meta_description: Electronic Arts has been recognized for several achievements in workplace excellence.
data.text:
Every day is more fun when your work is play. But there are a lot of things that we take seriously too. At Electronic Arts, our commitment to the growth, development, and well-being of our people is what’s driven our company’s culture to new heights. We’re leading the way in diversity, equity, and inclusion for our industry, changing gaming for good, and blazing new paths for more players to join in on the fun.

We want to be the best Electronic Arts we can be, and we want our employees to do the best work of their careers here. That’s why we’ve created an environment where people can truly thrive; we engage, listen, respond, and work together to support our team while creating unforgettable experiences for our millions of players around the world.

Huge congrats and an even bigger ‘Thank you!’ to our teams for earning these recognitions. We couldn’t be more proud, and we’re looking forward to more learning, growing, and playing together in 2024.

We exist to inspire the world to play, and we’re always looking for the right people to make that happen. As we dive into the new year ahead, we’re looking for innovative and collaborative folks with diverse perspectives to keep making Electronic Arts better. Check out our open roles!
